source:
#Update TIME.DIM_QTR_MNEMONIC_OFFSET table.

# Column_Name	            Update Frequency
# DAILY_QTR_MNEMONIC_OFFSET	First day of every quarter 
# QTR_MNEMONIC_OFFSET	    First MMW of every quarter
# CURR_QTR_INDC	            First MMW of every quarter

if is_first_MMW is None:
    logger.error("is_first_MMW is mandatory input parameter")
    mssparkutils.notebook.exit("is_first_MMW is mandatory input parameter")

else:        
    if is_first_MMW:
        #update QTR_MNEMONIC_OFFSET and CURR_QTR_INDC
        df_DIM_QTR_MNEMONIC_OFFSET = spark.sql("""
            select distinct
            YEAR_QTR_SEQ_WED AS YEAR_QTR_SEQ_WED,
            YEAR_QTR_SEQ as YEAR_QTR_SEQ,
            DAILY_QTR_MNEMONIC_OFFSET AS DAILY_QTR_MNEMONIC_OFFSET,
            cast((QTR_MNEMONIC_OFFSET -1) AS SMALLINT) AS QTR_MNEMONIC_OFFSET,
            CURR_QTR_INDC AS CURR_QTR_INDC,
            IW_ROW_UPDT_TS AS IW_ROW_UPDT_TS from time.DIM_QTR_MNEMONIC_OFFSET T
        """)
        df_DIM_QTR_MNEMONIC_OFFSET = df_DIM_QTR_MNEMONIC_OFFSET.withColumn('CURR_QTR_INDC', lit('N'))
        df_DIM_QTR_MNEMONIC_OFFSET = df_DIM_QTR_MNEMONIC_OFFSET.withColumn("CURR_QTR_INDC", when(df_DIM_QTR_MNEMONIC_OFFSET.QTR_MNEMONIC_OFFSET == 0, 'Y').otherwise('N'))
        logger.info("Writing data into TIME.DIM_QTR_MNEMONIC_OFFSET table")
        df_DIM_QTR_MNEMONIC_OFFSET.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").saveAsTable("time.DIM_QTR_MNEMONIC_OFFSET")
        logger.info("Load Completed: time.DIM_QTR_MNEMONIC_OFFSET")
    else:
        #update DAILY_QTR_MNEMONIC_OFFSET
        df_DIM_QTR_MNEMONIC_OFFSET = spark.sql("""
            select distinct
            YEAR_QTR_SEQ_WED AS YEAR_QTR_SEQ_WED,
            YEAR_QTR_SEQ as YEAR_QTR_SEQ,
            cast((DAILY_QTR_MNEMONIC_OFFSET -1) AS SMALLINT) AS DAILY_QTR_MNEMONIC_OFFSET,
            QTR_MNEMONIC_OFFSET AS QTR_MNEMONIC_OFFSET,
            CURR_QTR_INDC AS CURR_QTR_INDC,
            IW_ROW_UPDT_TS AS IW_ROW_UPDT_TS from time.DIM_QTR_MNEMONIC_OFFSET T
        """)
        logger.info("Writing data into TIME.DIM_QTR_MNEMONIC_OFFSET table")
        df_DIM_QTR_MNEMONIC_OFFSET.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").saveAsTable("time.DIM_QTR_MNEMONIC_OFFSET")
        logger.info("Load Completed: time.DIM_QTR_MNEMONIC_OFFSET")
